task: Identify hepatic stellate cells in this dataset
judge_prompt:
Evaluate whether the agent is able to identify hepatic stellate cells (HSC) in an AtlasxOmics dataset. 

    Check:
    1. Identify marker genes and perform gene set scoring. 
    2. Perform celll type annotation for each cluster. 
    3. Among existing clusters in adata.obs["cluster"], correctly identify cluster 5 as HSC.
